title: Let's Mutate! Mini Canvas with Easel
content: 2015 Let's Mutate! Mini Canvas Let's Mutate! series is a collection of vibrant lil monsters and creatures from the ethereal plane. Each one is hand painted on rag paper and attached to board for a pop-out effect on the canvas. Comes with a mini easel that allows you to display them on your desk, coffee table, book shelf, mantle or any other surface. For more pictures & sales info, visit my online shop here: BUMWHUSH STORE
